description: Information about the current Synapse Terms of Service (ToS).

termsOfServiceUrl.description: The URL that can be used to fetch the latest ToS using an HTTPS GET.

latestTermsOfServiceVersion.description: The semantic version of the latest ToS in the provided URL.  Callers will need to provide this version when submitting a request to agree to shown ToS.

currentRequirements.description: Information about the global ToS Synapse requirements that all users must agree to.
